column3: Applied to BIRT Net Income portion

column2: = (Net Income / Gross Receipts) × MIN(Gross Receipts, Exemption)

column1: CASH FLOW FORMULAS (paid in April of following year):

column2: = -(Est. BIRT + Est. NPT paid in prior filing)
= Tax Due + Est. BIRT + Est. NPT + Adjustment
No Est. BIRT if first year with actual BIRT liability
No Est. BIRT in 2026 if never paid BIRT during exemption period
